DOC.brief_summary: High frequency repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( HF-rTMS ) show safety efficacy treatment-resistant depression , require daily treatment 4-6 week . Accelerated HF-TMS ( aHF-rTMS ) , treatment deliver less time , would significant advantage term access , patient acceptance cost . In present open label trial investigator intend assess effectiveness acceptability novel aHF-rTMS protocol ( i.e. , 2 daily session 2 consecutive week ; 6,000 pulse per day ) . For , depressed outpatient receive aHF-rTMS protocol assess baseline week 3 9 several clinician- patient- report measure well computerized neurocognitive test .
DOC.criteria: Presence current major depressive disorder ( accord DSMIVTR ) improve ≥ 2 adequate antidepressant trial ( ) current episode ; Baseline score ≥ 13 QIDSC Stable medication regimen ( > = 4 week ) prior study enrolment Psychotic feature current episode Lifetime history psychotic disorder and/or bipolar I II disorder Substance alcohol abuse/dependence past 6 month Lifetime history major neurological disease ( e.g. , Parkinson 's , stroke ) Uncontrolled medical disease ( e.g. , cardiovascular , renal ) Pregnancy and/or lactation Presence specific contraindication rTMS ( e.g. , personal history epilepsy , metallic head implant ) Hearing loss
